tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Pradeepa, you are simply a blessing! I cannot express enough gratitude for the exceptional care and support you provided during my delivery. Your compassion, professionalism and expertise made a difficult time so much easier, and I will always be grateful. Your on time reply through whatsapp messages to all our queries helped a lot during pregnancy.I would highly recommend you to any expectant mother in need of a gynecologist.  Dr. Pradeepa, thank you for being such a shining example of what a great doctor should be. Your care and support will never be forgotten, and I wish you all the best in your continued success. Keep shining!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got my baby delivered by Dr. Pradeepa. *** ** ** ********* ******. For the very first visit I was totally satisfied with her down to earth friendly behavior and the way she treats the patients is ultimate. The best part of her is patience, open to answer as many doubts and questions, very quick response via watsapp. *** *** *** ********* *********** ***** *** *********. Overall my pregnancy journey went smooth because of her support. I glad to express my gratitude and thankfulness. I recommend those who wish to have safe and memorable experience, who expects transparency. Thank you for your guidance and support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Hi, this is Meghashri mohan I visited to sanjeevini diagnostic jayanagar for my pregnancy regular checkups and also delivered a baby girl in sai ram hospital under the guidance of Dr Pradeepa. She's been very helpful and very supportive, very calm and always explains things in easy way with a great smile, what else pregnant women wants. She is the one who encouraged for normal delivery  and personally believe that her as  my lucky doctor. Finally we have a beautiful little princess in our hand. Thank you so much mam.
reply_text: Thank u so much megha. God bless the little one

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Writing this review just because I was so so satisfied and happy with how comfortable she made me feel. Pradeepa ma'am explains with great patience anything you'd want to know. I would recommend her to everybody who's anxious about consulting a gynaecologist. Hands down the best 'doctor-experience' I've ever had. Would recommend 10/10. If I ever find the need to go to a gynaecologist again, I will blindly go to her!

review: I visited for my first pregnancy. Thanks to DR. PRADEEPA I delivered healthy baby. She explain in simple detail as patient can understand and very friendly. She s good in giving confidence and that helped me a lot,  as it was my first pregnancy I was little scared . I highly recommend Dr. Pradeepa.

review: I underwent my pregnancy follow-ups and I have taken my mom for post menopause diagnosis with Dr.pradeepa. she s very friendly and skillfull and well experienced dr in Jayanagar. She treats patients as her family member and more than her charges are also less comparing to outside hospitals. I would highly recommend Dr. Pradeepa for a good maternity care.
